Package Model

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Area
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Area
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class holds the things that are present on one screen of the game. We will have at least 10 of these, one for each of the 9 screens of the overland and at least 1 for the dungeon.
    Author:
    Wes Rodgers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
